commit message: Another README whatsnew entry
Update native with TextEdit tweaks (1-level undo, paste over)
Enabled cheat file text editor launch under OSX (open) and Linux (xdg-open).

Create the stencil texture after the temp fbo.

Otherwise, we'll bind the temp fbo as a texture while creating it.
Somehow my NVIDIA driver was making this work anyway?

Fixes #6611.
OSX bundle file generation with cmake.
OSX assets copy to bundle with cmake. Not a native solution, prone to errors.
Added OSX icon pack.

Merge pull request #6519 from juhalaukkanen/master

cheat.db import - minimal feedback to user
Update native with workaround for textedit losing focus
Qt: Update b.sh to support Qt/Symbian.
Oops, didn't like my comment.
Add iOS packaging to b.sh. Fix a bug.

Sailfish: More compatibility with SailFish OS. It also needs stddef where Maemo does.
Set packaging by default for iOS with b.sh.
Sailfish: define override since it is stuck on gcc 4.6.4. Compiles now.

Combine the low and highmem atlas in to one. Add this to the buildatlas script (it's just a diff).
Used USING_QT_UI but technically win32_ui should use this too?
Fix up a few minor issues. Spacing/tabs/names
Make sure OSX compiles out of the box.

Fix Cwcheat code type for address compare

0xD code type took wrong address argument. Hopefully fixes #6624.

Merge pull request #6630 from Krude/cwcheat-fix

Fix Cwcheat code type for address compare
OSX: Fullscreen workaround not needed with Qt.

Fix savestates when there are psmfplayers.

Oops.  Fixes #6613.
bump the translation submodule as requested by @QWEmct

Merge pull request #6633 from Bigpet/master

bump the translation submodule as requested by @QWEmct
Atrac buffer validate RIFF header

sceMpegRingbufferAvailableSize might use a different

Based on http://code.google.com/p/jpcsp/source/detail?r=1813
Fix #5112

Merge pull request #6641 from sum2012/mpeg-minor

sceMpegRingbufferAvailableSize might use a different ringbuffer than sceMpegCreate. Use the new one.

Merge pull request #6640 from JimLee168/master

Atrac buffer validate RIFF header

x86 JIT: Fix bug where NOR would not get computed correctly in corner case

(CompTriArith can end up not actually mapping rd to a register when taking
a shortcut)

May fix the JIT issue mentioned by CPkmn and located by daniel229 as an aside in #6638

x86 jit: Further fix for nor, thanks unknown

See #6638

umd0 solution: Add 'OnlyEntireISOFileSystem'

Wraps around an ISOFileSystem, redirecting all the filenames to '' to
achieve the desired effect (should fix Bleach Soul Carnival 2 without resorting
to CPkmn's hack from #6638)

Probably breaks savestates as-is...
Rename to ISOBlockSystem, savestate workaround (?)

Fix crash after loading state from within Psmf movie

(a variable was not initialized)

Merge pull request #6643 from hrydgard/umd0-openiso

umd0 solution: Add 'OnlyEntireISOFileSystem' to fix #6638

Win32: Fix a minor fullscreen bug.
If the window is maximized before going fullscreen, the taskbar appears on top, which is not desirable.
Also, apply the maximized state properly again after exiting, if the user had the window maximized.
Win32: Query WMI for the GPU driver version, and display it in the System Information screen.
Tiny style typo fix.
Update native.

Merge pull request #6658 from thedax/win32-sysinfo

Win32: Add a 'Driver Version' line in the System Information dev tool screen.
Disk swap: Remount the ISOBlockSystem too. Should fix #6662
Make GPU driver version check lazy, add error checks. May take care of #6669

Merge pull request #6670 from hrydgard/remount-fix

Disk swap: Remount the ISOBlockSystem too. Should fix #6662

Buildfix Travis.

Can no longer use separate items for elifs.

Fix a warning in a log message.

Unfortunately, this will not properly log > 2 billion cheats.  I think
we'll manage to survive.

Use checked pointers in all function replacements.

Some games are still hitting bugs and there's no way to disable this 'fast
memory' without losing graphical effects.  Better to do it evenly than
weird hacks and extra logging/checks.

Disable a bunch of function replacements.

These are just for speed, let's turn them off.  Using a flag because:
* I think there's still some issue with savestates, not sure.
* We might swap this flag to a separate option.

Use a lookup for function replacements.

Ought to be a tiny bit quicker.

Don't zero out downcount in replacements.

It doesn't write out js.downcountAmount in any of these cases, so zeroing
it is wrong.

Disable tests and etc. when destroying framebufs.

Fixes #6678.  May fix problems loading savestates as well.

Disassemble bne/etc. using rs, rt order.

The order makes more logical sense from game disassembly, and matches the
assembler.  Fixes #6632.

Show the replaced instruction in disassembly.

Useful while debugging.
Wrong permission in jpn0.pgf. It should have the same as other files (-rw-rw-r--).

Merge pull request #6684 from sergiobenrocha2/master

Wrong permission in jpn0.pgf. It should have the same as other files (-rw-rw-r--).

Use glStencilMask() to partially simulate amask.

Alpha won't be correct, though.
Update native
Merge branch 'stencil-mask' of github.com:unknownbrackets/ppsspp into unknownbrackets-stencil-mask
Merge branch 'unknownbrackets-stencil-mask'

Merge pull request #6680 from unknownbrackets/replace-funcs

Disable most replacements and use checked mem access in them

Use correct stencil values with non-add blending.

Otherwise, we get the min/max/etc. value instead.
Also do it here, although may be removed soon.
Buildfix.
One last buildfix (please correct if GL_FUNC_ADD is wrong, I just wanted buildbot to work again). https://github.com/hrydgard/ppsspp/pull/6679 should replace this soon.
Qt: Allow building with system ffmpeg. Also update b.sh to set cmake and qmake flags in case --qt is at the end of the arguments.

Merge pull request #6651 from thedax/win32-fullscreen

Win32: Fix a minor fullscreen bug.

Qt: Change target name to ppsspp by default.Install icons and desktop file on Linux. Use a different builddir than SDL by default.
Should help distros packaging ppsspp. Note: if you currently use PPSSPPQt, you will need to move the config dir from PPSSPPQt to ppsspp.
For distro packagers, you can now use PREFIX and DESTDIR for installs.
Linux: Look for assets directory in /usr/share/ppsspp/.

Merge pull request #6692 from Barthalion/systemwide-assets

Linux: Look for assets directory in /usr/share/ppsspp/.

Correctly break when disabled and temp bps overlap.

Only affects debugging, not usual gameplay.  Fixes #6700.

Reduce Sybmian parallel build for Travis.

May help reduce the random failures.

Ignore displaybuf in psmfplayer when warming up.

Should fix #6704.

Merge pull request #6706 from unknownbrackets/psmfplayer

Ignore displaybuf in psmfplayer when warming up
Fix out-of-memory on Symbian Travis builds when compiling qrc_assets.cpp.

add sceUsbGpsOpen() function
fix typo,add sceUsbGpsGetState() function

Don't need duplicate the whole table

Add sceLibFttt
Don't show upgrade notifications if PPSSPP is too new, regardless of iRunCount.
Remove chinese forum
One more

Fix Symbian build in Travis.
Add a 'no_assets' option to Qt that allows building without pre-compiled assets inside the binary.
GCC has issues with high memory usage when compiling the assets file, so this is used as a workaround for Travis.

Merge pull request #6731 from sum2012/patch-1

Remove chinese forum link
Fix USE_BONE_ARRAY (currently disabled.)
Make the keyboard analog limiter customisable.
Make it available for everybody.
Update native.
Default to a deadzone 0.6f (60%) instead, as suggested.
Reload the stream on loop. Fixes #6703. Thanks to @unknownbrackets

Merge pull request #6728 from thedax/kbd-analog-limit

(Redux) Make the keyboard analog limiter customisable.

Merge pull request #6733 from hrydgard/psmf-loop-fix

Reload the stream on loop. Fixes #6703.

Only loop at video end.

In case of a short video that runs out of data but isn't ready to loop
yet.

Don't recurse when disasming an emuhack.

Although, should this happen?  Apparently does in Peace Walker.

Merge pull request #6735 from unknownbrackets/psmf-loop

Only loop psmf players at video end
Make 'Analog Limiter' translatable

Merge pull request #6738 from vnctdj/patch-1

Make 'Analog Limiter' translatable

Clarify GetSureBranchTarget() for fpu branches.

They also have CONDTYPE_ flags.  Looks like this was just getting lucky
that rs can't equal rt, but the code looks confusing when you're looking
at it from an fpu/vfpu perspective.

Skip emuhacks when showing encodings in debugger.

This can cause confusion when it doesn't match the displayed disasm.
Update lang
Update version to 0.9.9.1
